summary.span: 指定有关在从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印时如何打印文档的信息，包括打印文档的打印机。

span.span: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，可以通过访问 或 属性来修改打印机设置。Typically, you access a through or properties to modify printer settings. 最常见的打印机设置为 ，它指定要打印到的打印机。The most common printer setting is , which specifies the printer to print to. 有关 Windows 窗体打印的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 该示例有三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 已将名为的变量 `filePath` 设置为要打印的文件的路径。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 已经定义了一个名为的方法 `pd_PrintPage` ，该方法处理 事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 已将名为的变量 `printer` 设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The parameterless constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 通常，你不会创建的实例 ，而是使用 来设置打印机的设置。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用双工打印，并且打印机支持，请将设置 为其中一个 值。To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set to one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打印文档是否逐份打印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.

value.span: 若文档是逐份打印的，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the printed document is collated; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当副本数大于1时才执行排序。Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1. 设置 属性以指定要打印的份数。Set the property to specify the number of copies to print. 如果将设置 为， `true` 则在打印下一个副本的第一页之前将打印文档的完整副本。Setting to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed. `false` 打印下一页之前，将按指定的副本数打印每个页面。`false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short Copies { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要打印的文档份数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.

value.span: 要打印的份数。

span.span: The number of copies to print.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有打印机都支持打印多个副本。Not all printers support printing multiple copes. 您可以使用 属性来确定打印机支持的最大副本数。You can use the property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports. 如果副本数设置为高于打印机支持的最大副本数，则仅打印最大份数，且不会发生任何异常。If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur. > [!NOTE] > 某些打印机可能不支持一次打印多个副本。Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以获取打印机的， 而无需创建打印作业。With the method, you can obtain a for the printer without creating a print job. 你可以使用 来决定如何对复杂的打印作业的字体、大小和类型样式等视觉元素进行布局。You can use the to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户选择打印范围时，将使用和属性。The and properties are used by the when the user selects a print range. 必须将属性设置为，以 `true` 使用户能够指定打印范围。The property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range. 此外， 要求 指定和， 并且 值在该范围内。In addition, the requires the and to be specified and the value to be within that range. 在打印过程中，在 事件中，查看 以确定应打印的内容。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果 为 ，则使用 和 属性来确定应打印的页面。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果 为 ，则为所选页面仅指定输出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. 还可以通过编程方式进行设置，尽管 实现是相同的。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

span.span: The property's value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int GetHdevmode() cil managed

summary.span: 创建与打印机设置相对应的 结构的句柄。

span.span: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
A handle to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 结构特定于设备。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. `DEVMODE`不支持将结构从一个 打印机复制到 另一台打印机。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 当你完成通过此方法创建的句柄时，必须通过调用本机 Win32 方法自行取消分配该句柄 `GlobalFree` 。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 调用此方法时，将作为参数传递到方法的返回值 。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

span.span: The printer named in the property does not exist.

exception.span: 未能检索打印机的初始化信息。

span.span: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.

A handle to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 结构特定于设备。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. `DEVMODE`不支持将结构从一个 打印机复制到 另一台打印机。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 当你完成通过此方法创建的句柄时，必须通过调用本机 Win32 方法自行取消分配该句柄 `GlobalFree` 。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 调用此方法时，将作为参数传递到方法的返回值 。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

exception.span: 属性中命名的打印机不存在。

summary.span: 创建与打印机设置相对应的 结构的句柄。

span.span: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
A handle to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你完成通过此方法创建的句柄时，必须通过调用本机 Win32 方法自行取消分配该句柄 `GlobalFree` 。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 调用此方法时，将作为参数传递到方法的返回值 。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property InstalledPrinters As PrinterSettings.StringCollection

summary.span: 获取安装在计算机上所有打印机的名称。

span.span: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.

value.span: ，它表示安装在计算机上所有打印机的名称。

span.span: A that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用已安装的打印机名称的集合向用户提供要打印到的打印机的选择。You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 `comboInstalledPrinters` 已安装的打印机填充组合框，并在 选择更改时使用属性设置打印打印机。The following code example populates the `comboInstalledPrinters` combo box with the installed printers and also sets the printer to print, using the property, when the selection changes. `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo`初始化窗体时调用例程。The `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine is called when the form is being initialized. 该示例要求 名为的变量 `printDoc` 存在并且存在特定的组合框。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#5)]

exception.span: 未能枚举可用的打印机。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`将属性显式设置 为之外的字符串值时，始终返回 `null` 。 always returns `false` when you explicitly set the property to a string value other than `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取指示该打印机是否是绘图仪的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.

value.span: 若打印机是绘图仪，则为 ；若打印机是光栅打印机，则为 。

span.span: if the printer is a plotter; if the printer is a raster.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘图仪是基于矢量的打印机，而不是基于光栅的打印机。A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based. 大多数基于矢量的打印机使用各个绘图笔生成输出。Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.

span.span: if the property designates a valid printer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置某些属性时，需要使用有效的打印机，否则会引发异常。When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised. 若要避免异常，请 在设置后使用属性 以安全确定打印机是否有效。To avoid exceptions, use the property after setting the to safely determine if the printer is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置属性来指定目标打印机 ，如果 为，则在 `true` 指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 该示例有三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 已将名为的变量 `filePath` 设置为要打印的文件的路径。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 已经定义了一个名为的方法 `pd_PrintPage` ，该方法处理 事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 已将名为的变量 `printer` 设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取旋转纵向方向以生成横向方向的角度，以度为单位。

span.span: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

value.span: 从纵向到横向所需旋转的角度（以度为单位）。

span.span: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的旋转值为90和270度。Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees. 如果不支持横向，则唯一有效的旋转值为0度。If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees. 将属性设置 为 `true` 以横向打印页面。You set the property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.

summary.span: 获取该打印机支持的纸张大小。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 通过属性表示纸张大小的实例，该 属性包含一个 值。The contains instances that represent the paper sizes through the property, which contains one of the values. 通常情况下，您可以通过该属性将页面的纸张大小设置 为有效的 集合。Typically, you set a page's paper size through the property to a valid available through the collection. 若要指定自定义纸张大小，请参见 构造函数。To specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `comboPaperSize` 用打印机支持的纸张大小填充组合框。The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes. 此外，还会创建自定义纸张大小，并将其添加到组合框。In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box. 标识为属性，该属性为通过组合框的属性添加的项提供显示字符串 。The is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the property of the combo box. 该示例要求 名为的变量 `printDoc` 存在并且存在特定的组合框。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置打印机名称后，调用 来确定是否将打印机名称识别为系统上的有效打印机。After setting the printer name, call to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system. 你还可以使用 属性来获取安装在系统上的打印机的列表。You can also use the property to get a list of printers installed on the system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置属性来指定目标打印机 ，如果 为，则在 `true` 指定的打印机上打印文档。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 该示例有三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 已将名为的变量 `filePath` 设置为要打印的文件的路径。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 已经定义了一个名为的方法 `pd_PrintPage` ，该方法处理 事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 已将名为的变量 `printer` 设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户选择打印范围时，使用属性。The property is used by the .when the user selects a print range. 默认 为 `AllPages`。The default is `AllPages`. 若要使用户能够指定要打印的页范围，必须将 属性设置为 `true` 。To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 若要使用户能够指定要打印的选定页面，则 必须将属性设置为 `true` 。To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 在打印过程中，在 事件中，查看 以确定应打印的内容。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果 为 ，则使用 和 属性来确定应打印的页面。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果 为 ，则为所选页面仅指定输出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. 还可以通过编程方式进行设置，尽管 实现是相同的。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

exception.span: 属性的值并非 值之一。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户选择 "**打印到文件**" 选项时，使用属性。The property is used by the when the user selects the **Print to file** option. 在这种情况下，当调用方法时，输出端口设置为 "FILE"，导致 Windows 打印子系统提示用户输入文件名 。In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅由使用 ，无法以编程方式进行设置。The property is only used by the and cannot be set programmatically. `Print to file`仅 当 属性设置为时，选项才会出现在中 `true` 。The `Print to file` option only appears on the when the property is set to `true`.
